abstract: TidalTV, an online video advertising network, has nabbed $16 million in a second round of funding, VentureBeat reported.
snippet: TidalTV, an online video advertising network, has nabbed $16 million in a second round of funding, VentureBeat reported.
lead_paragraph: TidalTV, an online video advertising network, has raised $16 million in a second round of funding, VentureBeat reported.
